channel.title: Lmao they think im that stupid?
channel.description:
Your live ID will be closed
Dear user, We identify that its account is having access for third and sending viruses, Spam and malicious mails to the other members of the Hotmail community.
Had such reason we will close this mail account if you does not take the measures of security below:
Measures of Security:
1) Go to this link: http:/ /www.hotmail.com/hotmail_security/, download and executes the security archive to eliminate possible malicious agents infecting your computer;
2) After having done this, your computer will be more safety, but still we recommend that it modifies the password of this email.

Never pass your passwords for nobody, and intent to the new updates of our protections. Windows Live Hotmail. Fast, simple and safe from what never. To live is good. item.title: Lmao they think im that stupid?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:10, topic:147019”][quote author=Bobby link=topic=201053.msg1786032#msg1786032 date=1191006464]
thats funny that some is in spanish.
[/quote]

Thats Portuguese …[/quote]
thats true, i gave it a once-over and i have only been taking spanish for a month so…

item.title: Lmao they think im that stupid?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

I think that this could actually be real… He could have used an online translator to translate it from his language to ours. And all online translators suck because they translate word for word while that’s actually incorrect.
